sense.def:
An invitation
je napisana ali izgovorjena prošnja, naj nekdo pride na neko prireditev, na primer na zabavo, obed ali sestanek.

seg.quote: Cindy accepted invitations to cocktail parties.
I had an invitation to go and talk to the cadets.

sense.def:
Vizitka ali papir, na katerem je napisano povabilo, prav tako imenujemo
an invitation
.

Vedenje, ki človeka spodbudi, naj nekaj stori, imenujemo
an invitation
.

seg.quote: Houses left unlocked are an open invitation to burglary.
